Credit Line: The Cesnola Collection, Purchased by subscription, 1874–76
Description: Small unguentarium.Colorless with pale blue tinge.Rim folded out, over, and in; flaring mouth; cylindrical neck with tooled indent around base; small ovoid body; round bottom.Intact; few bubbles but one large elongated bubble in neck; dulling, limey weathering, and iridescence, with some soil encrustation.
